title: Graphitic carbon nitride-based efficient nanocomposite: a low cost and stupefying photocatalyst for the derogation of tetracycline and As3+ in wastewater
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00376D, Paper
Kabir Hussain Badagoppam Haroon, Varsha UshaVipinachandran, Santanu Bera, Vijay Sithaiyan, Susanta Kumar Bhunia
The paucity of pure water has become a serious concern due to the rapid increase of industrialization and massive population growth. The frequent usage of colorless pollutants in our daily...
